ISSUE.TITLE: Override backend parameters from CLI
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The CLI analyze and eval/evaldir commands could support a parameter like `--backend-param tfidf-fi.chunksize=5` that could be used to override backend options defined in backends.cfg. This would make it easier to experiment with different parameters.
